name: noble_se_tweaks
title: Noble's Space Exploration Tweaks
author: Noble
description:
Adds toggleable tweaks for some things in Space Exploration, currently adds 10+ new features, more info available on the Mod Page. 
Has Krastorio 2 as a soft dependency, it is not needed to use this mod, those features will simply be disabled! 
Got an idea/suggestion/bug report? Throw it in discussion, or simply message me on Discord: TheNoble#3409
